title: Sample Book, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: paper, printed silk 
Technique: samples of printed plain and crepe weaves
creditline: Museum purchase from The Grodzins Fund for Textile Acquisition
description: Book of bound pages in which 57 samples of printed silk have been pasted, intended as a sample book from which customers could order the fabric for kimono.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, late 19th–early 20th century.
late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: paper, printed silk 
Technique: samples of printed plain and crepe weaves. Museum purchase from The Grodzins Fund for Textile Acquisition. 2000-9-1.
